messages.title: Last project
messages.classic:
Vermeille Avocats strive to offer their clients tailor-made legal solutions that correspond to their client's specific economic needs.

At Les Animals, we built them a Wordpress site with a theme tailored to their needs. We strived to be innovative while respecting the greatness of their profession.

messages.title: Late thoughts
messages.classic: Adopting a slightly nihilistic approach to your work can actually improve your workflow by reducing the fear of criticism. Mind you, I'm not saying that you should work on everything without a care in the world. Rather, it's about freeing yourself from the fear of criticism by embracing the idea that nothing really matters.
